import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Help from '../help/help' import Login from '../login/loginForm' import './navbarStyles.css' const NavBar = () => { const [signedIn, setSignedIn] = useState(false) useEffect(()=> { console.log(signedIn) }) return(

DROUOT DIGITAL

{/* Connexion button, help button (right hand side) */}
{signedIn ? "logout" : }
  • VENTES AUX ENCHERES
  • BUY NOW
  • BEAUX ARTS
  • MOBILIER & OBJETS D'ART
  • COLLECTIONS
  • LUXE & ART DE VIVRE
) } export default NavBar
